Reviews.Title: “Amazing hotel”
Reviews.Author: Maryam-jalal
Reviews.Content: I advice all the travelers to visit this hotel, it's very nice and clean, in perfect location just 5 min from the blue mosque which is in front of the tramway so you can go to every where in Istanbul by the cheapest transport. Also the staff are very friendly and helpful specially mr Cafer and mr Murat in the reception they help us to know about the city and Mr Cihan he teach me how to make Turkish coffee and special thanks to the cooker mehmet yildirim for the delicious cake he made it for my birthday. I love this hotel and inshalla I will visit it again ;) Maryam & Jalal April 2012

Reviews.Title: “warm and friendly”
Reviews.Author: lesstravelled405
Reviews.Content: just returned from turkey . stayed at ALBINAS in istanbul . what a pleasent stay we had . rooms were clean , staff was very polite and friendly esp cafir , breakfast was very appetising . it used to be a delight returning to the WARM hotel after the freezing weather outside . strongly recommend it to all as one can walk it to all the interesting places . KUDOS !

Reviews.Title: “great location-super friendly stall”
Reviews.Author: snicola21
Reviews.Content: very nice hotel,modern,clean with comfort rooms and facilities...great location in the heart of old city...the staff is ready to help you for everything you ask...10 points to Cihan Yaman, to Cafe and all the staff that i cannot remember their names...we will absolutely stay there in our next visit to Constantinopoli!

Reviews.Title: “Better attention impossible!”
Reviews.Author: Alexandre U
Reviews.Content: Besides an excellent localization, cleanliness, comfort and good prices the personal attention afforded by MURAT, HIKMET and CAFER was the high point offered by the hotel!

Reviews.Title: “Clean rooms, nice people”
Reviews.Author: AngelfishGirl
Reviews.Content: The Albinas is a nice little hotel on a quiet street. There's a great view of the Blue Mosque from the rooftop terrace. The rooms are VERY small (which is true all over Sultanahmet), but clean as a whistle. The decor, which is white and calm, is a welcome respite from Istanbul's color and bustle. The staff is helpful, pleasant, and very friendly. We loved the breakfast, which is plentiful and fresh (the granola bar, which has yogurt, dates, figs, and nuts, was a special treat). The place itself isn't particularly exotic or special, but it makes a quiet and refreshing base from which to see this marvelous and exciting city. You're a five minute walk from Topkapi or the Blue Mosque, about a block from the Sea of Marmara. (My only advice is, if you want a room with a view, avoid room 107, which looks out over the air-conditioning unit and is on a noisy staircase).

Reviews.Title: “Fabulous Service in Prime Location”
Reviews.Author: jag027
Reviews.Content: We just returned from a trip to Istanbul and stayed at this hotel. We can't say enough good things about the staff--helpful, friendly, warm. And the hotel itself is very comfortable. The breakfasts are huge and the choices are overwhelming. Kudos to the chef! Hotel staff were the best we encountered in Turkey. I was sad saying goodbye to them--Cihan,Cifer, and the others go out of their way to make you feel at home. I turned 50 while staying there and they arranged for a birthday cake! If I went back to Istanbul, I would stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “Tastefully done new hotel in Sultanahmet”
Reviews.Author: 90basso
Reviews.Content: 21 yr old male travelling with 61 yr old mother. We organised an airport transfer through the hotel as we were arriving late at night. Driver was helpful and van was decorated with a turkish rug, curtains and had a bowl of turkish delight: nice touches for first time visitors to Turkey. Also good idea for arriving as I'm sure it'd be easy to get lost! Great location: a few minutes walk to Sultanahmet square: this means that the area is quite touristy though. Staff were helpful and breakfast was pretty good: mix of Turkish and western stuff. However, my mother did order a western tea...it wasn't the best. I think just stick with the Turkish stuff. Great views from the rooftop terrace and nice place to sit. Rooms are nicely done. Staff are helpful: reception staff speak English well and the other staff are very attentive to help with bags etc. Hotel is very close to a taxi stand so very easy to get them.

Reviews.Title: “10 points hotel”
Reviews.Author: ampmadrid
Reviews.Content: I stayed one night at Albinas hotel and I will repeat next time I'll visit Istambul. Perfect location, close to HayiaSofia Mosque. Breakfast was vey nice and with assorted salt&sweet choices. The cook went out several times to check everything was presented as he expected and said hello to everybody in a very kind way. The room was clean, causy, comfortable and ellegant, and the guy in the reception, Cafer, was really kind and attentive. Excellent professional. I forgot to take my invoice and he just sent it to my email inmediately. Next time I visit Istanbul (hope in two months) I know I will be in Albinas. 10 out of 10 points. 100% recommendable

Reviews.Title: “Welcomed Like Family!”
Reviews.Author: ElleMoth
Reviews.Content: I can't recommend The Albinas highly enough. The rooms are beautiful, spacious, and quiet, and the location is unbeatable. The breakfast is gourmet - the best I've ever seen in a hotel. The best part of the hotel is the staff, who go above and beyond their jobs in everything they do. (And not just one or two people, but everyone.) You can arrive in Istanbul to a warm welcome from Cafer and Can, who will go out of their way to make sure you find everything you need. I also enjoyed chatting with Cihan, who made me feel at home, and Mehmet, who has a great sense of humour. :) The staff made me feel genuinely welcome - not as a customer, but as a guest. The hotel is a guaranteed great experience. I'll take every opportunity to go back and strongly recommend it. Other notes: I was surprised on my second day with a bottle of excellent white wine and a fruit plate sent "from the manager." (See the photo - gorgeous!) I also recommend the amazing Boukoleon restaurant (just 30 feet up the hill) for fish and a stunning view of the Marmara.

Reviews.Title: “greatfull stay !!! sabÄ±ne”
Reviews.Author: sabine m
Reviews.Content: Ä± dont wanna wrÄ±te many thÄ±ngs !Ä± was just 5 days -Ä±n thÄ±s great hotel! and recommend here absolutly ,cause they have very nÄ±ce breakfast,staff excallent,the lady speacÄ±ally,madam gurkanGÃœNES,she was too helpfull to us !!and also mr .cook mehmet he made us happy wÄ±th hÄ±s specÄ±al omlets :) and Ä± wanna gÄ±ve bÄ±g THANK YOU from austrÄ±a,Ä±ll come to vÄ±sÄ±t you agaÄ±n hopefully next year!! sabÄ±ne und mark :) thnk U ALBINAS!!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Love to stay again”
Reviews.Author: sardar m
Reviews.Content: i stayed at Albinas hotel for two nights. An ideal location which is very close to all major tourist attractions. A very clean hotel with a very friendly atmospehere. The hotel staff was very cooperative and willing to help in every possible manner. They guided us about istanbul to the best of their abilities, especially MR Can was very helpful and gave us special attention during our stay. Right from the hotel booking through the manager Mrs. Ilknur Gurkan till our departure it was an excellent experience.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Hotel and Attention”
Reviews.Author: 310sebastian
Reviews.Content: Very clean, near to the major touristic places in the old city center, and great people always ready to help you. Cafer, Ayse, Cinam and Celal did a great job to feel myself like home. Thanks to everybody. We will see again soon! Happy New Year 2012!

Reviews.Title: “Excellent hotel”
Reviews.Author: Anastasios K
Reviews.Content: All was wonderfull,the hotel is clean , nice and so close to all..stuff was excellent ,very happy to stay there

Reviews.Title: “Extremely good location.”
Reviews.Author: kwars0123
Reviews.Content: To anybody who knows Istanbul, when I say that this hotel is midway between the Aya Sofia and Topkapi on one side and the Blue Mosque on the other, they will realise that it couldn't be better placed. This is not one of the big faceless hotels one finds all over the world. It's a small, clean and well-kept one. Every member of the staff we met was very friendly and the Receptionists could all speak very good English. The ever-smiling, fair-haired bellboy preferred showing off his Italian! In better weather one can have breakfast in the small terrace. I said "small" because there is a bigger one on the roof from where you get the most magnificent view. That this is an excellent place can be proved by the fact that my wife congratulated me on my choice!

Reviews.Title: “Great location, great staff and good value”
Reviews.Author: Tim I
Reviews.Content: The Albinas is a small hotel in a superb location right in the heart of the Old City and about 5-10 minutes easy walk to all the main tourist attractions, including the Blue Mosque (great view from the bedroom window), Aya Sofya, Topkapi Palace etc. The staff are very helpful and welcoming with excellent English. The decor is clean, bright, and modern. Our room was pretty small but perfectly adequate - very clean, good standard of furniture and a good shower (no bath though). The room air conditioning worked well and warmed the room very quickly in the very cold conditions of our visit. The room contained a mini-bar but no kettle or tea/coffee facilities and this was sorely missed. Breakfast was perfectly reasonable but not outstanding with a slightly eccentric selection of dishes from sweet Turkish cakes through olives, cheese and meats to random hot dishes (scrambled egg through to Frankfurters and peas). Good coffee and fresh fruit. In summary, we would highly recommend the Albinas for its staff, location and value for money. We would definitely book again.

Reviews.Title: “Very comfortable, nice location”
Reviews.Author: fabbas
Reviews.Content: Super service, friendly staff, they offer free airport pick up. Location is good, although a bit of walk from tram.. not far from blue mosq..breakfast could improve with some hot food additions. Shower cabinet very small but I suppose thats common with most hotels in the area.

Reviews.Title: “Very clean, very new”
Reviews.Author: sankes
Reviews.Content: Rooms are very clean and new..bathrooms a little small. Rooftop terrace is excellent with views of blue mosque. Breakfast is adequate, service at breakfast is non existent, check out is slow with sending the errand boy to check you haven't consumed from the mini bar, hotel information in the room is minimalist but given thus is a new hotel I'm sure this will all improve. The prices are very reasonable so they get 4 stars from me despite a few shortcomings.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent even after a 5 star major hotel”
Reviews.Author: Marlon M
Reviews.Content: Very clean. Beautiful decor. Excellent service and great attitude by the staff especially the front desk and in comparison with other places in the area. Excellent service. At Albinas everything is white as the name implies and it stays that way. Imagine the great experience. They are in the heart of the action. Great terrace with great views.

Reviews.Title: “Very convenient location and cosy”
Reviews.Author: Stephanos T
Reviews.Content: This hotel is excellently located within walking distance of the main tourist attractions of the city. I found the staff at the reception particularly helpful, especially Mr Selcuk Gunes who helped me a lot with getting around, finding restaurants, etc. The room had everything you could possible want and was clean and nicely furnished. Overall, the hotel contributed to making my stay in Istanbul a most enjoyable one. I would strongly recommend it to anyone.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent hotel”
Reviews.Author: evelyn c
Reviews.Content: The staff are excellent and wonderfully helpful. The hotel is located right in the tourist area, with an easy walk to everything. Quaint little hotel - brand new - good amenities and lovely breakfast. We would certainly stay there again and recommend it to others. Peter and Evelyn Australia Sept 19th 2011

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful experience”
Reviews.Author: Amna A
Reviews.Content: Albinas is a neat and tidy hotel with all the facilities one needs being away from home. A very friendly and helpful staff. Hiqmat Babar and the General manager of the hotel are very considerate and gave us all the information regarding city tours. Thank you Albinas for making our stay at istanbul wonderful!

Reviews.Title: “We loved our stay and we will be back”
Reviews.Author: EhabElmongy
Reviews.Content: Location is excellent in the historical area & close to Sultanahmet Tram Station.A Taxi station is 50 meter from the hotel. Very clean. Great breakfast. Nice staff and helpful. Air conditioned.

Reviews.Title: “We are repeat customers - and will definitely come back.”
Reviews.Author: Kathy M
Reviews.Content: A clean and well appointed hotel with friendly helpful staff. Beginning with a thoughtful email offer to arrange an airport shuttle arranged by Iknur Gurkan. Welcoming staff, especially Cihan Yaman and Selcuk, made our stay most enjoyable. The breakfast buffet includes a varied menu including delicious traditional Turkish dishes.

Reviews.Title: “I really enjoyed my stay”
Reviews.Author: Lylia-09
Reviews.Content: It was my first time in Istanbul. I will never forget my lovely stay at the albinas hotel. I came from Canada and spent there 11 days. The hotel is new, clean and very well located !!! people are so nice especially Mr Djafer and Mr Hikmat, The diretor Ilknur G. Gurkan is really kind and helpful, she made my stay! I had a room on the top floor with a nice balcony the view was fantastic. However, I missed Turkish cakes at the breakfast. I will come back inchallah and I want to have the same room!

Reviews.Title: “enjoyed our stay and we'll be back”
Reviews.Author: Oana A
Reviews.Content: We have enjoyed everything about our stay in this lovely hotel. The location is excellent, on a small street close to the blue mosque and hagia sofia. The staff was very friendly and helpful. Thank you all and especially Erin Akan for making our stay very pleasant.

Reviews.Title: “Charming and Inviting”
Reviews.Author: Karolina P
Reviews.Content: I absolutely loved Albinas Hotel! This was my third trip to Istanbul and although I liked my other hotels, I thought this was top notch. The rooms were spotless and I especially enjoyed the elevator which piped Mozart and the rooftop view had accompanying Turkish music. The food is very good at this hotel and Chef takes a lot of care. What adds to the charm of this hotel is the super nice staff. They treated me so well, having nice conversations with me during the day but the night staff treated me with such great respect that they made me feel like an old friend.

Reviews.Title: “Cool!”
Reviews.Author: JamesSHIU
Reviews.Content: The hotel is very clean and the service is very good! Thanks Selcuk!

Reviews.Title: “best trip in turkey ever :)”
Reviews.Author: gizmoswizz
Reviews.Content: was a nice trip there and good service :) thanks for this verry nice vacations there :) best service from selcuk on the reception. thanks :)

Reviews.Title: “WHERE COMFORT IS NOT A LUXURY”
Reviews.Author: MUZZY3030
Reviews.Content: If there had been a box beyond "excellent" I would have ticked it. The service we received was quite simply exceptional. The room was beautiful and very clean, and, I do not like staying at a 5 star hotel or a hotel chain, it had character. The general manager who run the establishment were unerringly pleasant and helpful, suggesting restaurants, organising taxis to and from the airport and keeping our luggage for us even though we had a late flight on the day we checked out. The location is perfect; we were easily able to walk to all the major attractions and were spoiled for choice with restaurants, etc. Do yourself a favour and stay here if you can!

Reviews.Title: “A wonderful experience!!!”
Reviews.Author: Mac5151
Reviews.Content: New, neat, beautiful hotel! Hotel staff is very cooperative, especially mr hikmet babal. Highly recommended

Reviews.Title: “we come back!”
Reviews.Author: kuschelbeer96
Reviews.Content: The Hotel is very fine. The Service and other size are very good!

Reviews.Title: “A greatful stay in Istanbul”
Reviews.Author: Marcelkoch
Reviews.Content: The Albinas Hotel was a great hotel because it is really just freshed opened. Everything was cleaned, especially the personal was very good. Here you can feel hospitality. Special Thank for Hotel Manager Ms. Ilknur she was really helpful all the time and was looking for contact with the guests and of course with us. The rooms are very good furnished and everything is new there. So i had a greatful time there. If i will go next time to Istanbul i will take this hotel again.

HotelInfo.Name: Albinas Hotel
HotelInfo.Address: Kucukayasofya Mah. Mustafapasa Sok. No:48 | Sultanahmet, Istanbul 34122, Turkey
